movie.title: Avengers: Endgame
movie.description: Earth's mightiest heroes team up one last time to undo the damage caused by Thanos. Epic, emotional, and action-packed.

movie.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movie.description: Peter Parker deals with multiverse chaos as past Spider-Men return to help him fix a spell gone wrong.

movie.title: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child
movie.description: A young boy discovers he's a wizard and attends Hogwarts, where he faces magical adventures and a dark enemy.

movie.title: Frozen
movie.description: Princess Elsa accidentally reveals her ice powers, causing eternal winter. Her sister Anna tries to bring her back.

movie.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
movie.description: Autobots team up with animal-like Maximals to stop the planet-eating villain Unicron from destroying Earth.

movie.title: Cars
movie.description: Race car Lightning McQueen learns life lessons when he ends up in a small town far from fame and racing.

movie.title: Coco
movie.description: A boy travels to the Land of the Dead to learn about his family history and follow his dream of becoming a musician.

movie.title: Moana 2
movie.description: Moana sets out on a new adventure across the seas to protect her people.

movie.title: Inside Out
movie.description: A girl’s emotions (Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, and Disgust) help her navigate big life changes in a fun, thoughtful way.

movie.title: Encanto
movie.description: In a magical family, one girl with no powers discovers she’s the key to saving their magic and bringing everyone together.

movie.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
movie.description: A group of misfit heroes — including Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, and Groot — team up to protect the galaxy.

movie.title: Barbie
movie.description: Barbie and Ken leave Barbieland and explore the real world, leading to funny, emotional, and eye-opening adventures about identity, purpose, and self-discovery.

movie.title: Monsters University
movie.description: Mike and Sulley meet in college, where they start as rivals but become best friends while training to become top scarers.

movie.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movie.description: Batman faces his greatest challenge when the Joker, a chaotic criminal mastermind, threatens Gotham City with destruction and fear.

movie.title: The Chronicles of Narnia
movie.description: Siblings enter a magical world through a wardrobe and fight to save it from evil.

movie.title: The Maze Runner
movie.description: Teens trapped in a mysterious maze try to find a way out while uncovering secrets about their world.

movie.title: Home Alone
movie.description: A clever boy sets traps to protect his new home from art thieves while his family is away during the holidays.

movie.title: Snow White
movie.description: A live-action remake of the classic fairy tale where Snow White, with the help of seven magical friends, stands up to the Evil Queen and discovers her own strength and voice.
